name: Weather Frenzy!
description:
You're a greedy lil' slime that consumers EVERYTHING (Yes, we mean everything). One day you accidentally consumed the weather controller, and now the sky is raining one second, then thunder and blizzard another second , causing the terrain to shift every minute. THE WEATHER IS OUT OF CONTROL AND SO IS THE LEVEL!

You must look to navigate through this mini metroidvania-esque game in different weathers (with different effects to the map) and look for a way to restore the weather controller by finding all 5 weather orbs!

Controls:

AD = Move left and right
Space = Jump
W , S = Weather Auras (once unlocked)
